mapper.update:
update ad_seat_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city = #{city,jdbcType=BIGINT},
region = #{region,jdbcType=BIGINT},
street = #{street,jdbcType=BIGINT},
media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_seat_type = #{adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_seat_type_text = #{adSeatTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
media_type_parent_id = #{mediaTypeParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
media_type_id = #{mediaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unique_key = #{uniqueKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_code_url = #{adCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_size = #{adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_area = #{adArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
private_car_pv = #{privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bus_pv = #{busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
map_standard = #{mapStandard,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_cell = #{contactCell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
allow_multi = #{allowMulti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
multi_num = #{multiNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_code_flag = #{codeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ad_seat_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=BIGINT}, region = #{region,jdbcType=BIGINT}, street = #{street,jdbcType=BIGINT}, media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_seat_type = #{adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_code_url = #{adCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_size = #{adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, private_car_pv = #{privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bus_pv = #{busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ad_code_flag = #{codeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.street, b.media_name, a.ad_seat_type, a.ad_seat_type_text, a.media_type_parent_id, a.media_type_id, a.unique_key, a.ad_code, a.ad_code_url, a.location, a.ad_size, a.ad_area, a.pv, a.private_car_pv, a.bus_pv, a.lon, a.lat, a.map_standard, a.contact_name, a.contact_cell, a.memo, a.allow_multi, a.multi_num, b.id as mediaid, c.name as parentName, d.name as secondName, a.ad_code_flag from ad_seat_info as a left join ad_media as b on a.media_id=b.id left join ad_media_type c on a.media_type_parent_id=c.id left join ad_media_type d on a.media_type_id=d.id where a.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.name, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.street, a.media_id, a.ad_seat_type, a.ad_seat_type_text, a.media_type_parent_id, a.media_type_id, a.unique_key, a.ad_code, a.ad_code_url, a.location, a.ad_size, a.ad_area, a.pv, a.private_car_pv, a.bus_pv, a.lon, a.lat, a.map_standard, a.contact_name, a.contact_cell, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.memo, a.allow_multi, a.multi_num ,a.ad_code_flag from ad_seat_info a left join ad_media b on a.media_id = b.id where b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.street = #{street,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id;

select a.id, a.name, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.street, a.media_id, a.ad_seat_type, a.ad_seat_type_text, a.media_type_parent_id, a.media_type_id, a.unique_key, a.ad_code, a.ad_code_url, a.location, a.ad_size, a.ad_area, a.pv, a.private_car_pv, a.bus_pv, a.lon, a.lat, a.map_standard, a.contact_name, a.contact_cell, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.memo, a.allow_multi, a.multi_num ,a.ad_code_flag from ad_seat_info a left join ad_activity_adseat b on a.id = b.ad_seat_id where b.id = #{adActivitySeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into ad_seat_info ( name, province, city, region, street, media_id, ad_seat_type, ad_seat_type_text, media_type_parent_id, media_type_id, unique_key, ad_code, ad_code_url, location, ad_size, ad_area, pv, private_car_pv, bus_pv, lon, lat, map_standard, contact_name, contact_cell, create_time, update_time, memo, allow_multi, multi_num, ad_code_flag ) values
(#{info.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.province,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.city,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.region,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.street,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.adSeatTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.mediaTypeParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.mediaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.uniqueKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.adCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.adArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{info.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{info.mapStandard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.contactCell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{info.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{info.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.allowMulti,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.multiNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{info.codeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select , st_distance(point(lon,lat),point(#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}))*111195 as distance from ( select * from ad_seat_info a where exists (select 1 from ad_activity_adseat b where a.id = b.ad_seat_id and b.monitor_start < now() and DATE_ADD(b.monitor_end,INTERVAL 1 day) > now()) and a.lon between (#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}-#{metreDegree,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) and (#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}+#{metreDegree,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) and a.lat between (#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}-#{metreDegree,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) and (#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}+#{metreDegree,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) ) t having distance <= #{metre,jdbcType=DOUBLE} order by distance
